GSD.description:
bfq: fix use-after-free in bfq_dispatch_request

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.110 by commit df6e00b1a53c57dca82c63b5ecbcad5452231bc7. For more details please see the references link.
